creator: RA:D
descriptionHtml:
PanoSlice started out as a image cutter for Instagram, but we felt something was incomplete. With the help of our users and their invaluable feedback we were able to put together this: an Instagram app with the original image cutter feature along with a colored and white background photo editor and collage maker to make the first Instagram layout design maker. This app helps you design your Instagram feed and impress other followers and get those Instagram likes. Of course, you can make a collage using white background for Instagram pic.
It is essentially a grid post maker for Instagram. Use PanoSlice to do your favourite Instagram tiling. Split pic in grids for Instagram post. Use it as a panorama photo editor & pic collage app. Make amazing layout maker for Instagram.


PanoSlice lets you cut image into a swipable canvas. Crop from 2 to 10 photos at once! It is a grids creator for Instagram banners and collage. Split photos for instagram - in instasize grid photos!

It’s as simple as it sounds!
1) Upload photos, place them within the canvas - move the images around with the help of horizontal scroll.
2) Crop, resize, zoom, edit and upload your grid design sequentially!

This app can be used for slicing panoramic images as well as uploading multiple images to
create swipeable collages!

***************************************************************************************
Tap on the image to use image specific features
Double Tap on canvas to unselect image
**************************************************************************************
Extend canvas upto 10 swipeable photos!

PanoSlice app lets you explore and create the layout design you need for your feed!

What was only possible on desktop software can now be done right on your smartphone!
Impress you Instagram followers and gain more followers with every upload.
Use a three image canvas to design your grid and nail that insta aesthetic feed.

Create new styles and experiment with your cool designs & get new and more followers for your Instagram profile.

All photos are HD Quality.


PanoSlice is a mood board for Instagram!

And not just for Instagram, carousel posts can be used for Facebook, Linkedin and Twitter and other social media as well.

Make your brand story heard with this unique carousel composer.

Make one now! 😁

Share creative multiple post with your followers now!

We regularly add photo effects for Instagram! Have any suggestions? Leave a review and we will add them for you.

This app is mostly useful for -
* Individuals
* Artists
* Photographers
* Brand Pages
* Brand agencies
* Social media marketers
* Influencers
* Brand marketers
* Content Marketing

**********************************************************************************

container.value: Row House 78, Konark Nagar, Viman Nagar, Pune -411014

creator: RA:D
descriptionHtml:
At PanoSlice we bridge the technology and design gap for the artist. An easy-to-use design interface helps you get the desired design outcome within minutes. From memes to motivational quotes and from posters to powerful presentations PanoSlice has all it takes to help you up your game and surge ahead of your competition. Impress your Instagram followers and gain more followers with every upload.

Who you are?
An individual or an agency who is one of the following:
* Fashion Enthusiast
* Content Creator
* Educator
* Design Enthusiast
* Brand Storyteller
* Freelancer or Influencer
* Digital Marketer
* Photographer
* Brand Page
* Brand agency
* Social media marketer
* Brand marketer
* Content Marketer

Why PanoSlice is for you if you have anything to do when it comes to creativity and creation?
From Instagram to LinkedIn we provide you seamless and connected story creation platform.

Be it any design segment you work in, now you can create the following:
• Grid posts
• Creative Multiple Posts
• Layouts for Instagram
• Panorama Posts for Instagram
• Panorama maker
• Templates for photo
• Photo collages
• Niche collages
• White background photo editor for Instagram
• Inspiration boards
• Moodboards
• Storytelling for LinkedIn
• Instagram stories

We know that your creations are your identity.
So we let you take your homework with you using PDF and PNG export.

We realize you don't like making mistakes.
We let you review your work using Preview for Instagram before it goes out in the world

Where there’s PHOTO editing there’s PanoSlice!
The features the app supports include photo editing online, image editing, image masking, image cutting or cropping, finally helping in the process of graphic design with filters and effects. And realizing the importance of how a user always feels the need to remove the background we present to you the Background Eraser. Remember you can always UNSPLASH stock images. Gridmaker allowed split photos for instagram

Get Creative with Stickers
We give you preloaded stickers from ones that are trending to the ones that are the latest in the market. That’s not all. These are editable stickers. So, go ahead get crazy you creative genius.

We give you the power to pen-down your words with style.
Text styling and text editing features will help you elevate your creativity levels

Carousels are the lifeline of today’s social media content and we make it seamless and flawless
If you are one in the process of establishing your personal brand then you have come to the right place. Make one or make multiple projects. Consistency is the name of the game we must say. Seamless canvas, seamless carousels, and carousel wallpapers are the USP of this app unlike any other. Select from the multiple aspect ratio options. Let your imagination run wild by creating scroll posts for Instagram, swipeable posts for LinkedIn and Instagram, and a carousel for Instagram. And hey did we mention that you can add up to 10 slides in one go.

We know you always want more. Fret not. Here’s what’s new as part of our appreciation of your everlasting love for PanoSlice.

• Panoslice Premium – With a yearly subscription you own every single of our in-app offerings
• Panoslice templates – Our main job is to ensure we provide a helping hand to your creative ingenuity
• Panoslice designs – Whenever you feel like you’re running out of design ideas, we are there to rescue you
• Panoslice Carousels – Like no other app we give you the latest weapon for winning the digital battle. We empower your digital existence.

PanoSlice has been developed by artists for the artist in you.

In case you have feedback for us, hit us up on our website and let us know how we can better your design experience.
descriptionShort: One-stop-shop for all seamless carousel needs even for beginners and non-experts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello People!

We hope you're doing well and feelin' creative 🕺

Here are some small changes to make a big difference -

What's new -

• Export your creation as PDF, JPEG or PNG

What's fixed -

• Image disappearing on returning from preview
• Overall app performance improvements

Happy Designing ❤️🎉

See you soon again,
Your friends at PanoSlice

Who you are?
An individual or an agency who is one of the following:
* Fashion Enthusiast

* Design Enthusiast

* Brand marketer

Why PanoSlice is for you if you have anything to do when it comes to creativity and creation?
From Instagram to LinkedIn we provide you seamless and connected story creation platform.

Be it any design segment you work in, now you can create the following:
• Grid posts
• Creative Multiple Posts
• Layouts for Instagram
• Panorama Posts for Instagram
• Panorama maker
• Templates for photo
• Photo collages
• Niche collages
• White background photo editor for Instagram
• Inspiration boards
• Moodboards
• Storytelling for LinkedIn
• Instagram stories

We know that your creations are your identity.
So we let you take your homework with you using PDF and PNG export.

We realize you don't like making mistakes.
We let you review your work using Preview for Instagram before it goes out in the world

Where there’s PHOTO editing there’s PanoSlice!
The features the app supports include photo editing online, image editing, image masking, image cutting or cropping, finally helping in the process of graphic design with filters and effects. And realizing the importance of how a user always feels the need to remove the background we present to you the Background Eraser. Remember you can always UNSPLASH stock images. Gridmaker allowed split photos for instagram

Get Creative with Stickers
We give you preloaded stickers from ones that are trending to the ones that are the latest in the market. That’s not all. These are editable stickers. So, go ahead get crazy you creative genius.

We give you the power to pen-down your words with style.
Text styling and text editing features will help you elevate your creativity levels

Carousels are the lifeline of today’s social media content and we make it seamless and flawless
If you are one in the process of establishing your personal brand then you have come to the right place. Make one or make multiple projects. Consistency is the name of the game we must say. Seamless canvas, seamless carousels, and carousel wallpapers are the USP of this app unlike any other. Select from the multiple aspect ratio options. Let your imagination run wild by creating scroll posts for Instagram, swipeable posts for LinkedIn and Instagram, and a carousel for Instagram. And hey did we mention that you can add up to 10 slides in one go.

We know you always want more. Fret not. Here’s what’s new as part of our appreciation of your everlasting love for PanoSlice.

• Panoslice Premium – With a yearly subscription you own every single of our in-app offerings
• Panoslice templates – Our main job is to ensure we provide a helping hand to your creative ingenuity
• Panoslice designs – Whenever you feel like you’re running out of design ideas, we are there to rescue you
• Panoslice Carousels – Like no other app we give you the latest weapon for winning the digital battle. We empower your digital existence.

PanoSlice has been developed by artists for the artist in you.

In case you have feedback for us, hit us up on our website and let us know how we can better your design experience.

title: PanoSlice: Seamless Carousel & Cropped Panorama

creator: Blank Canvas Design Co.
descriptionHtml:
Panoslice is a one-of-a-kind graphic design editor for a one-of-a-kind creator like you. 🦄

Create seamless carousel posts for instagram in a freeform canvas or choose from 100+ carousel templates. 😃 Panoslice is an Instagram carousel maker for creators who want to stand out to the social media and gain followers for instagram. Create creative multiple posts from scratch within minutes and convert your designs into graphic templates and creative grid layout for instagram.🧑‍🎨 Along with the instagram carousel maker you also get a instagram story maker in the same app. Our inbuilt story editor offers rich features that allow you to do the following :

- Photo filters
- Photo collages
- Creative collage
- Reels cover maker
- Poster maker
- Story maker
- photo editor with filters, effects, background eraser, image shapes and more
- Photo effects
- Photo frames
- Creative story templates
- Instagram story templates

Panoslice started out as a photo editing app for instagram, helping users to design perfect grid posts for instagram or panorama crop for instagram.

With the requests of users we were able to add the following :

- Layout for instagram
- Scroll post for instagram
- Collage layout maker
- Story editor
- Youtube thumbnail maker
- Photography editor

Panoslice offers the most unique way to create photo grids within minutes, swipeable carousel post and even helps as a photography logo maker. 🦄

It is a one-stop shop for all your social needs to help get visibility and gain followers for instagram.

Create your own photography design and convert it into a photography template. Stay consistent with style and create the best grid with the best grid maker for instagram.

Panoslice is also a quotes maker for instagram. A quotes maker like Panoslice offers advanced typographic options like text for instagram, 100+ fonts for instagram, where you can edit text on image or add text to photos helping you create the perfect instaquote! If you are looking to create quotes with a photo text editor or photo text editor on image, panoslice is the perfect instaquote photo editor for you!

As a creator, if you upload story you might also be uploading highlight cover for instagram. We offer a canvas that can help you create instagram highlight cover. Panoslice offers a instagram highlights cover maker. Use PNG background to create the bets highlight cover for your page.

You can export as a PNG with a transparent background. Panoslice is a loaded PNG maker for you.

Seamless Carousel and swipeable panorama can be seen as a modern presentation maker for social media, hence we at panoslice have given you the option to convert your photo to PDF so you can upload it to Linkedin as well.

Apart from carousel you can also create poster with our poster maker and instagram collage maker.

Panoslice is a free instagram collage maker for story and posts. Out of the poster making app you may have tried so far, panoslice is definitely going to stand out to you. A unique instagram collage creator powered with a free image editor to help you create swipeable post for instagram within minutes. Instagram collage are the happening trend of 2021 and we are here to help you design the best swipeable panorama for instagram, effortlessly take your panorama split for instagram and post to any platform.

Initially, panoslice was a panorama crop for instagram. Happily and powerfully upgraded to more than that now. The perfect grid maker for instagram, seamless photo for instagram and seamless collage maker.

Panoslice is weekly updated with new instagram templates or you can duplicate any finished project and become your own instagram template maker.

Make swipeable instagram with Panoslice. You can also design youtube thumbnail banner, twitter banner, social media ads, and more.


We'd love to hear from you, feel free to write to us at care@panoslice.com

PanoSlice has been developed by artists for the artist in you. 🧑‍🎨

Happy creating!

title: PanoSlice: Instagram Collages and Story Templates

creator: Blank Canvas Design Co.
descriptionHtml:
Create beautiful scroll posts, story & collage layouts with 200+ design templates for your instagram profile 🚀

Panoslice is a unique & powerful canvas editor that let's you design creative multiple posts, instagram carousels, stories & more.

Create compelling photo grid collage for posts in minutes, keep your followers hooked with every swipe 🎠

Panoslice is a creative instagram post maker that offers 200+ professional designs for instagram feed layouts & story collage templates. Create stunning photo collage layouts for instagram & insta stories with our easy-to-use designs, fonts & tools that will take your content creation to the next level.

- Instagram grid & post templates from collections like Ripped Paper, Polaroid frames or FILM templates
- Use advanced typography tools to create the perfect message for your followers
- Add Photo filters, stickers, textures & backgrounds
- Share to instagram, facebook, linkedin, whatsapp & more

|Seamless Canvas|

Panoslice offers a seamless & swipeable canvas that is connected like a panorama layout. Add upto 10 slides to create a unique display of your images with text & stickers. Once you are ready to save the post, it will be automatically cropped seamlessly & saved to your device. Create scroll posts that are connected seamlessly & give your followers unexpected visual effects using visual storytelling.

|Templates & Collage Layouts|

Explore a vast library of 200+ layouts from collections like Torn Paper, Analog film, Polaroid, Textures, RetroUI, Journal moodboard & more. Simply add your best images into the frames & instantly design professional & beautiful social posts for your instagram feed. Create your IG story design & post design like having your own team of designers. It's time to take your brand to the next level.

|Fonts & Text editing| ✍️

Apply new styles to your designs with over 100+ handpicked fonts chosen for you. Apply advanced tools like Line spacing, Text wrap, Letter spacing & more to create perfect layout for your text. Bring back your design mojo 💪

|Filters, Effects, Image shapes & more| 🖼️

Create a colour story with aesthetic filter preset like grain, plastic & more. We also have tweaks adjustments like Brightness, contrast, saturation, exposure to bring the best out of your images.

Add different shapes to your images with image masks. Over 200+ Masks & shapes available for your images. Want to remove background from your images? Do it with our eraser tool. Want to do a one-touch background removal? Use our magic brush tool.

|Backgrounds & Stickers| 🎨

Apply unique backgrounds to your layouts like textures, seamless patterns & gradients. With over 500+ stickers, you can unfold new design possibilities.

|Aspect Ratios|

Multiple aspect ratios to help you create insta stories, photo collage layouts, YouTube thumbnails, Reels cover, Highlight covers & more. Also, use transparent background in case you need to work with your logo or even create a new logo! Most used aspect ratios include insta square, portrait, landscape & story. So you can create all your favorite designs in a size of your choice!

|Panoslice Premium|

Panoslice premium is a membership that will unlock your creative potential without any limits. Become a member to unlock the full experience of Panoslice.

- Access to unlimited templates & fonts & all premium assets like stickers, masks etc
- No ads
- Cancel Anytime

No rush though! Until you're ready, use the app for free & make the most with free instagram templates.

Panoslice helps you create unique content for your audience & gain new followers to. Design combinations that are never seen before almost like creating unique story art. Unfold new opportunities with design on our seamless canvas. Start creating unique brand posts now!

We believe with the right tools, everyone is a creator. We'd love to hear your ideas & suggestions.
Email us at care@panoslice.com or message us on Instagram at @panosliceapp
